languages.text: Onсe per turn when the wielder kills an enemy with this knife they cast War Hymn which does not provoke AoOs.

traits.locale_text: Onсe per turn when the wielder kills an enemy with this knife they cast War Hymn which does not provoke AoOs.

languages.text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
languages.original_text: Убив врага этим ножом впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж немедленно использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой Гимн{/g}, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a turn, they immediately use War Hymn which does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bu bıçakla bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilk kez bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde anında {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} kabiliyetini kullanır. Kabiliyet, {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bu bıçakla bir turda ilk kez bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde anında {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} kabiliyetini kullanır. Kabiliyet, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

Kullanan kişi, bu bıçakla bir {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} ilk kez bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde anında {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} kabiliyetini kullanır. Kabiliyet, fırsat saldırılarını tetiklemez.

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo con este cuchillo por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, usa inmediatamente {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} sin provocar {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador mata a un enemigo con este cuchillo por primera vez en un turno, usa inmediatamente {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} sin provocar ataques de oportunidad.

languages.text: 当装备者使用这把武器在{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内首次击杀敌人时，装备者会立刻发动{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}能力，且发动能力时不会触发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用这把武器在回合内首次击杀敌人时，装备者会立刻发动{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}能力，且发动能力时不会触发借机攻击。

languages.text: La première fois que l'utilisateur tue un ennemi avec ce couteau lors d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il utilise immédiatement {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g}, sans provoquer d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La première fois que l'utilisateur tue un ennemi avec ce couteau lors d'un tour, il utilise immédiatement {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g}, sans provoquer d'attaques d'opportunité.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}内に初めてこのナイフで敵を倒したとき、即座に{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}戦の聖歌{/g}を使用し、{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を引き起こさない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がターン内に初めてこのナイフで敵を倒したとき、即座に{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}戦の聖歌{/g}を使用し、機会攻撃を引き起こさない。
使用者がターン内に初めてこのナイフで敵を倒したとき、即座に{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}戦の聖歌{/g}を使用し、機会攻撃を引き起こさない。

languages.text: Tötet der Träger dieses Messers in einem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erstmals einen Gegner, setzt er sofort {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} ein, die keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffe{/g} provoziert.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tötet der Träger dieses Messers in einem Zug erstmals einen Gegner, setzt er sofort {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} ein, die keine Gelegenheitsangriffe provoziert.

languages.text: Убив врага этим ножом впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж немедленно использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой Гимн{/g}, не провоцируя {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder kills an enemy with this knife for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they immediately use {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g}, which does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Убив врага этим ножом впервые за ход, персонаж немедленно использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой Гимн{/g}, не провоцируя атаки по возможности.
Убив врага этим ножом впервые за ход, персонаж немедленно использует {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Боевой Гимн{/g}, не провоцируя атаки по возможности.
